title: Task Completion
description:
- Evaluate multi-step workflows where the agent must plan, revise, and recover from errors
- Measure success across both deterministic and open-ended tasks
- Test generalization to unseen tasks requiring novel planning

title: Tool Use
description:
- Measure accuracy in selecting the correct tool for the job
- Evaluate parameter correctness and efficiency of tool calls
- Introduce intentional tool errors to test error-handling and fallback strategies

title: Planning Ability
description:
- Analyze chain-of-thought depth, logical consistency, and branching strategy
- Test with long-horizon tasks requiring decision checkpoints
- Measure how the agent revises plans dynamically when conditions change

title: Robustness
description:
- Evaluate resilience against ambiguous instructions, missing data, and noisy environments
- Test robustness against adversarial inputs and misdirection
- Measure the agent's ability to detect and avoid hallucinations or unsafe actions
